Sådan er det både globalt og lokalt, hvor vi har 12 kontorer fordelt rundt omkring i landet. Dermed er vi både tæt på dig og vores kunder.

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: We are looking for bakers/pastry chefs in Midt/Sønderjylland.
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for bakers in Sønderjylland/Midtjylland.

We are looking for employees for immediate start-up.
We are currently looking for bakers/pastry chefs who are seeking long term work and have experience working in bakery or similar working place.

The working tasks can be different but will include:
- Decoration and baking tasks.
- Stand by machines and check quality.
- Sorting items and cleaning tasks.
- Pack bread cakes in bags and prepare for shipment.

Since it is a bakery, it has a very strong focus on hygiene, therefore it is an advantage if you have worked in similar environments in the past. If you don't have any experience, you will need to learn these guidelines quickly.

You as an employee:

  • - You must be able to communicate in either english, danish or german.
  • - You have a positive attuide and good work ethic.
  • - You are stable and punctual.
  • - You are flexible for different kind of work tasks.

Working hours:
You will be part of a full-time shift schedule where you typically work 4 days one week and 6 days the other week. This means that you will work every second weekend and have a day off every week.

The working days are during the night/early mornings.

You are offered:
Salary and terms according to the Craft Bakery Agreement

Interested?
If you have any questions, please feel free to contact Adecco on 38387070. Otherwise, don’t hesitate to apply today!
You can also send an application to: Nikolaj.holm@adecco.dk
